name: Asteroids! by jon213
description:
Just an asteroids clone I decided to make,  EXCEPT it's better than the original asteroids. It has power ups and umm... that's about it for now. However I would still love for you to download this game and tell me what you think! I am open to any suggestions you may have to make this game better.

I am planning to add a boss fight and some more power ups 

arrow keys to move

space to shoot 

shift to teleport

r to restart and enter to go to main menu

escape to exit
